explains: adj. 残忍的；无慈悲心的

sentences.en: Monsanto's critics have attacked the company for its "merciless legal battles against small farmers" and they are hoping this will be the case that puts it in its place.
sentences.cn: 孟山都的评论家抨击该公司“对小农户发起了无情的法律斗争”，他们希望这一案件能让它得到应有的惩罚。

sentences.en: Facebook, in particular, has been a merciless poacher from Google.
sentences.cn: 尤其Facebook，一直残酷无情地大挖谷歌墙角。
